Convert a date in 'SLF numeric format' to Date type

Source: R/convert_date_types.R
convert_numeric_to_date.Rd

Convert a numeric vector to a date - YYYY-MM-DD

Usage

convert_numeric_to_date(numeric_date)

Arguments

numeric_date

a numeric vector containing dates in the form YYYYMMDD

Value

a Date vector

See also

Other date functions: calculate_stay(), compute_mid_year_age(), convert_date_to_numeric(), end_fy(), end_fy_quarter(), end_next_fy_quarter(), fy_interval(), is_date_in_fyyear(), last_date_month(), midpoint_fy(), next_fy(), start_fy(), start_fy_quarter(), start_next_fy_quarter()

Examples

convert_numeric_to_date(c(20210101, 19993112))
#> [1] "2021-01-01" NA
